channel.title: What Now? - And a Question To The Devs
channel.description:
[details="weapons/click.exe"] ![image|690x466](upload://v2ssMugvALw8qm9N2iZGD7bS71U.jpg) ![image|690x367](upload://z1oXCuqucUPr503zrzTHIXjDHk7.jpg) ![image|690x368](upload://7ejd981PJtTHqfikmWowxNSG5kA.jpg) ![image|690x372](upload://nS6hwZSxclicOmCqJTAFReQoIxa.jpg) ![image|690x373](upload://bddzP7XByA6rcScCf8avvwcssoh.jpg) ![image|690x371](upload://wRKFgLmVOaSbVGGaFEkutrsvqZy.jpg) ![image|690x376](upload://pman2YvROO2bp6OxZpjddnhGNe4.jpg) ![image|690x371](upload://d1x7deaTFRFqpW75PlGZBG57iQs.jpg) ![image|690x364](upload://aupzhImILBJCnGG1VX4aVfvnge8.jpg) [/details]
[details="armor/click.exe"] ![image|690x373](upload://zFnogJTHw5607MDgubd5EHf7rsS.jpg) ![image|690x370](upload://rj1sdEl3M3MQHYaO6TMjq5dAsmg.jpg) ![image|690x372](upload://fG0WIl5jfix8cQX78oauvtP1Ubm.jpg) ![image|690x376](upload://zhoRacRYFxNjDRHJXQDfe5at5Ol.jpg) ![image|690x374](upload://rFzh9AZfmzhcmwgSNUF498I3HXH.jpg) ![image|690x372](upload://9nJ7G855do58NXlfXqKXMS3EiXY.jpg) ![image|690x371](upload://20aSBkK2QFa8jAMvw1MD9AnrjhG.jpg) ![image|690x186](upload://hDRhT81BHUD4CBlnwnhrgrUygq1.jpg) [/details] Have I "beaten" ToL, if so- what is there left for me to do with my GP?
--------- And my other question was, or rather- is, when will the Halloween event be ending?

item.title: What Now? - And a Question To The Devs
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
Start Saving for your xmas loot !!! I aint buying a think until I have enough gold for a Santa Hat!

Read full topic
item.source: What Now? - And a Question To The Devs

item.title: What Now? - And a Question To The Devs
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.source: What Now? - And a Question To The Devs

item.title: What Now? - And a Question To The Devs
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
Tbh I don’t think anyone’s beaten ToL till they add Ranked, i dont know what I was thinking.

And at which point, only one person has really ‘beaten’ ToL, which is, of course, he whom has the highest score.
Also, as per the 2nd question, that was to the devs, I know no one else knows. But maybe even the devs don’t know/havent decided on one yet so, we’ll see.

Read full topic
item.source: What Now? - And a Question To The Devs

item.title: What Now? - And a Question To The Devs
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
Dooku:

Have I “beaten” ToL, if so- what is there left for me to do with my GP?

You’re far from that and whoever is gonna reach that point when they’ll have everything, I don’t think they’ll be playing for so many hours just for some cosmetics. Plus, there will be more in the future Don’t forget the game has only been out for one month now.

Dooku:

And my other question was, or rather- is, when will the Halloween event be ending?

I don’t know, we’ll see.

Read full topic
item.source: What Now? - And a Question To The Devs
